{{Quote|Are you soft in the head? Turn this cart around.|The Frey guard to Sandor Clegane|The Rains of Castamere (episode)}}

A '''Frey guard''' is an unnamed minor character who appears in the [[Season 3|third season]] episode "[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]".
sections.Biography:
===Background===
He is a soldier sworn to [[House Frey]].
===[[Season 3]]===
The Frey guard turns [[Sandor Clegane]] and [[Arya Stark]] away from [[the Twins]] when they attempt to enter under the guise of a [[hog farmer]] and his daughter, as the surrounding soldiers prepare for the [[Red Wedding]] massacre. After Sandor voices doubt in the feast being over, the guard asks if he is soft in the head and tells him to turn the cart around.<ref>[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]</ref>
